title: Taric Idea *SPARKLE*
body:
Just a rough idea that I thought of when I was playing Taric(my favorite support) and had a Viktor on my team. Viktor starts with Hex Core, A unique Item to Viktor.
   My idea is that Taric starts out with a type of gem or has a gem slot as one of his items. The player could buy ruby, sapphire, topaz, emerald, opal, etc (all the games he talks about). The gem slot would increase a certain stat/lvl or add an effect to one of his spells. This could be either an item or a passive you buy from the store

replies.body:
Hmm, I don't like it if only because taric's current passive is fun in my opinion. I like beating the tar out of people while building frozen heart and iceborne. But I play raid boss taric. what do i know :P

Really its a question of what has to come out of his kit to allow this?

I like the idea, though it needs to not have the same issues that Viktor's hexcore has; which is that one upgrade overshadows the others instead of working for a certain situation, and not having a late game build.
Also creating a visual effect like a color change or something

He could even 'socket' gems into standard items Diablo II style, but then they would be lost if he combines the item. This would create a choice between bonus power in the early game or a higher potential for late game.

<3 Taric
But. Taric is already fabulous enough, he doesnt need any more gems to make him better.

You're saying you don't want Taric to be even more fabulous?

For shame...
